comments.body: Not sure why this is singular now ?
Consistency. The module is network. I set networks early on when I first wrote the module, before meraki_network was a thing.

Ok, so you're standardizing on the module name, not the internal REST call.
I guess both are fine, as it's not exactly exposed to the user so it doesn't really matter.

comments.body: Why is this now commented out ?
That had some additional functionality in it if you don't pass `data`. But I didn't have the backend fully implemented so I removed the functionality for now.
